problems.title: Z Algorithm
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given a text string T and a pattern string P, find all occurrences of P in T using the Z Algorithm.
Return the starting indices (0-based) of all occurrences in increasing order.
If no occurrence is found, return -1.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
ababcabcabababd abababd

Sample Output
8

Sample Input
aaaaa aa

Sample Output
0 1 2 3
problems.constraints:
1 <= |P| <= |T| <= 10^5
T and P consist of lowercase English letters.
hintsList: Compute the Z-array for the concatenated string.
